string.value: Magic of Kasandra

string.name: desc
string.value: 카산드라가 걸어 준 신비한 마법이다. 1시간 동안 공격력과 마력이 10, 방어력이 30, 명중률과 회피율이 20, 이동속도가 7, 점프력이 5 증가한다.

string.name: name
string.value: Fermentado Especial de Edmundo

string.name: desc
string.value: Um tônico que cura, feito com a receita secreta de Edmundo. Justamente o que você sente se ficar tomando friagem! [Restaura 50% do HP e do MP, também fornece ataque com armas +14 e com magia +30, por 10 minutos]

string.name: name
string.value: O Colar de Sophilia

string.name: desc
string.value: Uma jóia feita por Prendergast para a sua filha quando ela fez 16 anos, com a intenção de protegê-la.

string.name: name
string.value: Bolo de Marshmallows

string.name: desc
string.value: Um bolo de marshmallow saboroso e quente. Perfeito para uma noite no Dia das Bruxas!

string.name: name
string.value: Pára-Corações

string.name: desc
string.value: O fato de só provar deste bombom com tempero picante faz com que você sinta como se seu coração estivesse pegando fogo!

string.name: name
string.value: Bala Puxa-Puxa de Abóbora

string.name: desc
string.value: Bala puxa-puxa de abóbora adocicada em um pedaço de cana. [Defesa contra armas e magia, +15, por 5 minutos.]

string.name: name
string.value: Baba de Gosma Vermelha

string.name: desc
string.value: Lodo grudento supermastigável. Este tem sabor de cereja. Se lodos de verdade fossem bons assim... [Restaura 1.200 do HP e do MP.]

string.name: name
string.value: Lodo Grudento Verde

string.name: desc
string.value: Lodo grudento supermastigável. Este tem sabor de limão. Se lodos de verdade fossem bons assim... [Restaura 600 do HP.]

string.name: name
string.value: Lodo Grudento Púrpura

string.name: desc
string.value: Lodo grudento supermastigável. Este tem sabor de uva. Se lodos de verdade fossem bons assim... [Restaura 600 do MP.]

string.name: name
string.value: Lodo Grudento Alaranjado

string.name: desc
string.value: Lodo grudento supermastigável. Este tem sabor de laranja. Se lodos de verdade fossem bons assim... [Lodo grudento supermastigável.]

string.name: name
string.value: Soda Maple

string.name: desc
string.value: Enche a boca de água, refrescante, um doce prazer! [Precisão +100, por 1 minuto.]

string.name: name
string.value: O Bilhete de Tae Roon

string.name: desc
string.value: Um bilhetinho escrito por Tae Roon. Este bilhete foi encantado, por isso fornece ataque com armas +1 e com magia +3, por 1 minuto.

string.name: name
string.value: Biscoito em Forma de Cogumelo

string.name: desc
string.value: Um delicioso biscoito em forma de cogumelo para Sen. Esse biscoito faz qualquer um se sentir bem. Tão bem , que aumenta o bônus de Pulo em +3 por 3 minutos.

string.name: name
string.value: Pumpkin Piece

string.name: desc
string.value: A leftover piece of pumpkin from the Halloween Pumpkin. Has a sweet, mouthwatering scent to it. Recovers 50 HP and MP.

string.name: name
string.value: Halloween Candy

string.name: desc
string.value: A candy wrapped in stripes. Kids love it. Recovers 20 HP and MP.

string.name: name
string.value: Power of the Glowing Rock

string.name: desc
string.value: Received a mysterious power from the Glowing Rock. Boosts the weapon attack and magic attack slightly for 10 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Coconut Juice

string.name: desc
string.value: A small hole is up on the top of the Coconut, where the straw goes in. Drink the juice with the straw for maximum refreshment. Recovers 100 HP.

string.name: name
string.value: Cristal de Ataque

string.name: desc
string.value: Um cristal vermelho com um misterioso poder dentro dele. Aumenta o Ataque em +5 por 5 minutos.

string.name: name
string.value: Cristal da Precisão

string.name: desc
string.value: Um cristal azul com um misterioso poder dentro dele. Aumenta a Precisão em +5 por 5 minutos.

string.name: name
string.value: Concha Recheada

string.name: desc
string.value: Uma deliciosa concha recheada. Esta delícia só aparece por aí de vez em quando, então coma antes que esfrie. \n[Restaura 600 do HP e do MP.]

string.name: name
string.value: Molho de Amora

string.name: desc
string.value: Este delicioso molho de amora complementa quase todas as comidas! \n[Ataque com magia +30, por 3 minutos.]

string.name: name
string.value: Purê de Batata

string.name: desc
string.value: Parece que alguém derrubou esta batata. \n[Restaura 800 do HP.]

string.name: name
string.value: Molho de Carne

string.name: desc
string.value: A única coisa melhor do que um barco de molho é um trem de molho. \n[Restaura 800 do MP.]

string.name: name
string.value: Snowing Fishbread

string.name: desc
string.value: 물리공격력 20, 마법공격력 30을 15분간 상승시킨다.

string.name: name
string.value: Punho do Poder

string.name: desc
string.value: Um punho usado durante o Torneio de Caça. Aumenta Ataque e Ataque Mágico.

string.name: name
string.value: Asas do Vento

string.name: desc
string.value: Asas usadas durante o Torneio de Caça. Aumenta Velocidade e Pulo.

string.name: name
string.value: Crânio Doido

string.name: desc
string.value: Um crânio com olhos que giram, usado durante o Torneio de Caça. Inverte as direções.

string.name: desc
string.value: Um escudo usado durante o Torneio de Caça. Protege quem o portar da bomba uma única vez.

string.name: name
string.value: Presunto de MapleNatal

string.name: desc
string.value: Um Presunto de Natal que parece delicioso com um galho de visco em cima.\nRestaura 3.000 do HP e do MP.

string.name: name
string.value: Salmão Defumado

string.name: desc
string.value: Um jantar tradicional de VersalNatal. Cheira... a peixe. \nRestaura em torno de 2.385 do HP e 3.791 do MP.

string.name: name
string.value: Queijo Suíço

string.name: desc
string.value: Queijo da dimensão paralela de Versal. Parece engraçado, mas cheira muito bem. Ataque com magia +220, por 2 minutos.

string.name: name
string.value: Azeitonas Cobertas Com Açúcar

string.name: desc
string.value: Azeitonas cobertas com açúcar cor-de-rosa - um quitute especial que as crianças de Versal adoram! \nVelocidade +40 e salto +25, por 5 minutos.

string.name: name
string.value: Cebola Caramelada

string.name: desc
string.value: A guloseima favorita de O-Pongo! Caramelo cremoso recheado com uma cebola crocante! \nRestaura 800 do HP e do MP.

string.name: name
string.value: Wafer de Chocolate

string.name: desc
string.value: Uma bolacha crocante coberta com camadas de creme de chocolate. \nAtaque com armas +40, por 3 minutos.

string.name: name
string.value: Filtro Solar

string.name: desc
string.value: FPS 1.000. Bloqueia todos os raios nocivos, inclusive os mágicos. \nDefesa contra magia +200, por 10 minutos.

string.name: name
string.value: Pedaço de Carvão

string.name: desc
string.value: Restaura 1 do HP e do MP.

string.name: name
string.value: Snow Cake Piece

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of cake that consists of snow-white whipped cream and cherry. Recovers 300 HP and MP.

string.name: name
string.value: A Flurry of Snow

string.name: desc
string.value: 물리공격력 20, 마법공격력 30을 15분간 상승시킨다.

string.name: name
string.value: Elixir Demoníaco de Naricain

string.name: desc
string.value: Um líquido preto ardente que, se consumido, dá o poder de mil demônios. [Ataque com armas +140, por 8 minutos.]

string.name: name
string.value: Caldeirão Místico de Subani

string.name: desc
string.value: Bebendo o líquido azul que gira nesta pequena panela de ferro, você se enche de energia e emana uma aura protetora. [Defesa geral +100 e ataque com magia +200, por 10 minutos.]

string.name: name
string.value: Amplificador de Obstrução

string.name: desc
string.value: Preparado especial do John Barricada, usado para tirar ele do aperto. Use em caso de emergência! [Esquiva +50, Precisão +50, Salto +10, por 5 minutos.]

string.name: name
string.value: Sweet Heart

string.name: desc
string.value: Weapon attack +20, Magic attack +30 for 15 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Power Scream

string.name: desc
string.value: A power scream from Maple Admin. Weapon attack +8, Magic attack +12 for 30 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Party Bear

string.name: desc
string.value: Weapon attack +20, Magic attack +30 for 15 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Taru Face Paint

string.name: desc
string.value: This mystical camouflage allows the user to blend into his or her surroundings. [Gives +100 Avoidability for 5 minutes.]

string.name: name
string.value: Primal Brew

string.name: desc
string.value: A mixture made from an ancient Taru shaman recipe. Instills warriors with the primal strength of the Jungle Spirit. [Gives +35 Weapon Attack, +10 Accuracy for 20 minutes.]

string.name: name
string.value: Spirit Herbs

string.name: desc
string.value: Special incense used by ancient Taru shamans for communion rituals with the Jungle Spirit. [Gives +90 Magic Attack for 20 minutes.]

string.name: name
string.value: Jungle Juice

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious natural beverage made from a secret blend of jungle fruits, flowers, roots, and vines. The perfect thing to fuel a Taru brave through a long jungle trek! [Restores 1000 HP and 2000 MP.]

string.name: name
string.value: Treasure Hunt Note

string.name: desc
string.value: Spread all over the Maple World for the 5th anniversary of MapleStory, this note contains the prizes that you'll win when this is found.

string.name: name
string.value: Chocolate Cream Cupcake

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious chocolate cupcake with vanilla cream filling. One taste and you'll be hooked! [Restores 300 HP & MP, and gives +30 Accuracy, +30 Speed, and +30 Jump for 3 minutes.]

string.name: name
string.value: Big Cream Puff

string.name: desc
string.value: A rare, tasty dessert. Known as the 'Warrior's Dessert' to some and the 'Fattening Treat' to others. [Gives +30 Weapon Attack for 3 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Looks suspiciously like an energy drink. Drink at your own risk! [Gives +14 Weapon Attack for 15 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Looks suspiciously like an energy drink. Drink at your own risk! [Gives +22 Weapon Attack for 10 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Looks suspiciously like an energy drink, but drink at your own risk! [Gives +50 Magic Attack for 10 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Looks suspiciously like an energy drink, but drink at your own risk! [Gives +200 Magic Attack for 30 seconds.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Tasty and strong enough to dissolve rust from machinery! Drink at your own risk! [Gives +700 Magic Attack for 10 seconds.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Drink at your own risk! Gives the user a sudden jolting surge of energy, so use it or lose it! [Gives +1000 Magic Attack for 5 seconds.]

string.name: desc
string.value: Small pets love them. Recovers 30 Fullness. NOT for human!

string.value: Dry Treat

string.name: desc
string.value: A high-quality dry treat that the Pigmies love. Pets love them, too.

string.name: name
string.value: Lie Detector Test

string.name: desc
string.value: Can be used on suspected botters. Usable only when a suspect is hunting.

string.name: name
string.value: Orange Mushroom Piece

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Orange Mushroom. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Orange Mushroom. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: name
string.value: Ribbon Pig Piece

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Ribbon Pig. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Ribbon Pig. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: name
string.value: Grey Piece

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Grey. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Grey. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Elixir

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious elixir made by Moira which enables anyone that drinks this potion to temporarily transform into a dragon.

string.name: name
string.value: Tigun Transformation Bundle.

string.name: desc
string.value: A secret medicine that allows you to transform into Tigun, the patrol guard.

string.name: name
string.value: Rainbow-colored Snail Shell

string.name: desc
string.value: A special shell only found through Mano. Apparently it's powerful enough to grant a wish…

string.name: name
string.value: Change to Ghost

string.name: desc
string.value: First the body feels light, then all of a sudden, you're floating. Oh no, you're a ghost!

string.name: name
string.value: Ghost Candy

string.name: desc
string.value: A ghost-shaped candy with a mysterious set of ingredients. Apparently it has some special powers.

string.name: name
string.value: Sophillia's Abandoned Doll

string.name: desc
string.value: An abandoned doll that Sophillia threw away a long time ago, but revived by the Masked Man. Pet its hair, and you'll turn into Sophillia for 3 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Potion of Transformation

string.name: desc
string.value: The moment this potion is taken, you'll become a powerful, otherworldly being.

string.value: Potion of Transformation

string.value: The moment this potion is taken, you'll become a powerful, otherworldly being.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Restores tamed monster's fatigue level by 30.

string.name: name
string.value: Pheromone Perfume

string.name: desc
string.value: A perfume created by Kenta using Pheromone. Enables the user to tame hogs down at the Korean Folk Village.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pouch with a jewel on the surface. Possesses a special power in that double-clicking the pouch will suck up the surrounding ghosts in the area.

string.name: name
string.value: Element Rock

string.name: desc
string.value: A special alchemist tool that converts an absorbed power of monster into a jewel. The inner part seems to be slightly transparent.

string.name: name
string.value: Cliff's Magic Cane

string.name: desc
string.value: A magic cane that tames the lost Rudolph.

string.name: name
string.value: Transparent Marble

string.name: desc
string.value: A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster.

string.name: name
string.value: 1st Transparent Marble

string.name: desc
string.value: A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 1st floor.

string.name: name
string.value: 2nd Transparent Marble

string.name: desc
string.value: A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 2nd floor.

string.name: name
string.value: 3rd Transparent Marble

string.name: name
string.value: Lava Bottle

string.name: desc
string.value: A glass bottle that contains an actual lava, which is waiting to be spilled out. Drink this lava, and the lava will consume the body with fire, which will enable the drinker to master Fire Demon.

string.name: name
string.value: Black Cloud Machine

string.name: desc
string.value: A mechanical device that produces black clouds. Enables the character to acquire the Smokescreen skill using the clouds.

string.name: name
string.value: Firm Hand

string.name: desc
string.value: A stimulant packaged inside a bottle that resembles a clenched fist. Drinking the stimulant will allow the character to acquire The Will of a Warrior.

string.name: name
string.value: The Owl of Minerva

string.name: desc
string.value: #cThe Owl of Minerva#, which represents wisdom, can be used to search for items sold at the Free Market. #cDisappears right after showing the results of the item search#.

string.name: name
string.value: Teleport Rock

string.name: desc
string.value: Remembers 5 maps of your choice. This rock will enable you to #cteleport to the map you remembered#. It can even allow you to #cmove to the map where a certain character is#, provided that the person is in the same channel at the same world.

string.name: name
string.value: Pergaminho Branco

string.name: desc
string.value: Um dos pergaminhos sagrados de Subani. Se usado junto com um pergaminho normal ou negro, o slots de atualização de item não será reduzido se o pergaminho falhar. Entretanto, se usar um pergaminho negro, ainda há uma chance da arma ser destruída.

string.name: desc
string.value: First the body feels light, then all of a sudden, you're floating. Oh no, you're a ghost!

string.name: name
string.value: Empty Compass

string.name: desc
string.value: A compass with no markings. However, it can be turned into a working compass if you have the letters #cN,E, W,S#.

string.name: name
string.value: Golden Compass

string.name: desc
string.value: A golden compass that reveals the location of Gold Richie's Treasure Island. n#cBy double-clicking it# you can move to the island.

string.name: desc
string.value: Singapore local speciality spicy noodle. It triggers one to sweat after consumpsion.\nRecovers 800 HP.

string.name: name
string.value: Hokkien Mee

string.name: desc
string.value: Singapore's local speciality prawn noodles. It is normally served with prawns, chili & lime. \nRecovers 1200 HP.

string.name: name
string.value: Carrot Cake

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious local traditional food. It is made up of carrot extracts & secret recipes. \nRecovers 1800 HP.

string.name: name
string.value: Chicken Rice

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious Singapore local traditional food. The rice is covered with the fragrant secret recipes of chicken extracts.\nRecovers 2200 HP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious Singapore local traditional BBQ food. It is normally served with curry sauces. Its fragrance can be sensed a distance away.\nRecovers 2600 HP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fruit that is hard & sour. Its nutritional value improves our digestive system.\nRecovers 500 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fruit that is delicious & juicy. It is so sweet that it attracts ants if they are not well attended to. \nRecovers 800 MP

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Fruit

string.name: desc
string.value: Another fruit that is delicious & juicy, similar to Rambutan, it will attract unwanted pests if they are not attended. \nRecovers 1600 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: The fruit is nominated as the King of Fruits around the region. Despite having a hard & thorny shell, the fruit that lies within is extremely fragrant, and it tastes great! \nRecovers 3200 MP.

string.name: name
string.value: Nasi Lemak

string.name: desc
string.value: A popular Malay Traditional Dish mainly made up of rice, egg & cucumber, soaked with pandan fragrant.\nImproves Magic Attack +8 for 5 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Roti Prata

string.name: desc
string.value: A popular Indian Traditional Dish made up of flour. It is normally served with sugar & curry sauces.\n Improves Magic Attack +8 for 10 Minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Pepper Crab

string.name: desc
string.value: A popular Chinese traditional dish made of up fresh steam crab, pepper, egg & secret recipes.\nImproves Weapon Attack +8 for 5 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Chili Crab

string.name: desc
string.value: A popular Chinese traditional dish made of up fresh steam crab, chili power, egg & secret recipes.\nImproves Weapon Attack +8 for 10 minutes.

string.value: Summons 9 SG Exclusive monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons 4 SG Exclusive monsters.

string.name: name
string.value: The Energizer Drink

string.name: desc
string.value: An energizing drink packed with electrolytes. For 30 minutes, you will receive a boost of: Attack +25, Magic Attack +30, Defense +30

string.name: name
string.value: Elixir of Darkness

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious concoction of herbs brewed deep within the mountains of El Nath. [Gives +200 Magic Attack, -25 Defense for 5 minutes.]

string.name: name
string.value: Gold Dust

string.name: desc
string.value: Ancient dust found long ago by the miners in El Nath. [Gives +20 Defense for 5 minutes.]

string.name: name
string.value: Adonis Cauldron

string.name: desc
string.value: A rather clumsy attempt at potion creation by Adonis. Still useful in the hands of a skilled warrior. [Gives +40 Weapon Attack, +50 Avoidability, -30 Defense for 10 minutes.]

string.name: name
string.value: The Songs of Solomon

string.name: desc
string.value: An ancient collection of poems and life lessons from various elders, sages and warriors in the Maple World. Reading this allows one to gain their collective experience (EXP) in a single second. This edition provides 100,000 EXP. Only available for users under Level 51.

string.name: desc

string.value: The Writs of Solomon II

string.name: desc
string.value: An ancient document of collected wisdom from various elders, sages and warriors in the Maple World. Reading this allows one to gain their collective experience (EXP) in a single second. This edition provides 200 EXP. Only available for users under Level 51.

string.name: name
string.value: The Writs of Solomon I

string.name: desc
string.value: An ancient document of collected wisdom from various elders, sages and warriors in the Maple World. Reading this allows one to gain their collective experience (EXP) in a single second. This edition provides 100 EXP. Only available for users under Level 51.

string.name: name
string.value: Mini Draco Transformation

string.name: desc
string.value: The mysterious skills of an old halfling has transformed you into a form of a dragon. You can now fly.

string.name: name
string.value: Golden Pig's Shiny Egg

string.name: desc
string.value: An egg from a Golden Pig. You cannot tell what's inside. Double-click to crack it open.

string.name: name
string.value: Sorcerer's Potion

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a potion that you can buy from Sorcerer. It's potent, but its side-effects are equally strong. It's also very expensive, so be careful with it.
